long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ad Density is a Chrome extension which allows you to measure the ad density of a webpage with an ease. For publishers who are looking for a way to dynamically calculate the ad density of their pages, AdSelly provides an easy-to-use Google Chrome extension tool to test as many pages as they wish with no limitation. Stay compliant with the consumer-friendly ad density standards at any time.
============
Features
============
Measure the ad density of webpages
Switch between viewport or full-page ad density calculation in a single toggle

============
Feedback and Bug Reports
============
Ad Density is still in beta, if you're having issues or found a bug, please contact us directly so we can fix it: contact@adselly.com

============
Uninstallation Instructions
============
Open Chrome 
At the top right corner, click More tools
Then click Extensions
Click Remove
Confirm by clicking Remove

============ 
Enjoying Ad Density? Please Rate!
============
If you like Ad Density, please help spread the word by giving it a 5 star rating here.
If you have any suggestions regarding future improvements, please contact us at contact@adselly.com

============
Ad Density Homepage
============
For additional info, help and more, please visit our product page: 
https://adselly.com/addensity

============
Stay Tuned
============
The Ad Density measuring tool is the first of many awesome tools for the publishing business to be released. Keep monitoring https://adselly.com/
for future announcements!

============
Privacy Policy
============
We do not process our users’ personal or sensitive data or any personally identifiable information (PII).  

We do not trade our users’  personal or sensitive data to third parties.

We do not use extension cookies or other similar technologies to store any sensitive data or any PII.

We respect the privacy of our users. For more information please read our Privacy and Cookies Policy

Contact the developer - contact@adselly.com
